description.en: The Quantis network allows for p2p Intranet File Sharing, Anonymous Transaction, Decentralized Tools, and Applications all self sufficient and sustainable.  We welcome anyone who wishes to freely contribute to the Quantis Network.  We believe ln Quantis, and look forward to enhancing and upholding Satoshi's protocol and vision. Quantis was designed specifically for privacy. Instant tx, masternodes, Decentralized tools, intranet filesharing, and decentralized Applications, create a viable platform to communicate and transact securely.
